name: Black Survival Highschool! <DATING GAME>
description:
-- BLACK SURVIVAL HIGHSCHOOL --

We welcome you to an Alternative Universe of Black Survival - Peaceful BS Highschool setting! With a vast cast of 40+ characters, you will be able to meet and deepen your friendship/love with your favourite male/female Character in the BS universe! 

THIS IS A TESTING/BETA VERSION WHERE YOU CAN ONLY ACCESS TO EMMA ROUTE! Any feedbacks are welcomed!

UPDATING PATCH: JUNE 10TH - NEW EMMA BONUS SCENE

Note: This is a fangame project of the original Battle Royale Game BLACK SURVIVAL

This is a non commercial project, all artworks/music belong to original creators.
